message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CR 

The paper discusses the use of machine learning and natural language processing to analyze legal documents for risk assessment. This falls under the sub-category of computational linguistics (cs.CL) as well as artificial intelligence (cs.AI) due to the use of machine learning. The use of Paragraph Vector, an unsupervised model, also falls under the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG). The framework also involves supervised classification algorithms, which falls under the sub-category of information retrieval (cs.IR) and cybersecurity (cs.CR) due to the focus on risk assessment.
